name: InstallSSHKey
description: Install an SSH key prior to a build or deployment
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: hostName
inputs.label: Known Hosts Entry
inputs.helpMarkDown: The entry for this SSH key for the known_hosts file. Supports several hosts.

inputs.name: sshPublicKey
inputs.label: SSH Public Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The contents of the public SSH key. If not specified it will be generated out of private key.

inputs.name: sshPassphrase
inputs.label: SSH Passphrase
inputs.helpMarkDown: The passphrase for the SSH key, if any.

inputs.name: sshKeySecureFile
inputs.label: SSH Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the SSH key that was uploaded to `Secure Files` to install on the agent.

inputs.name: addEntryToConfig
inputs.label: Add entry to SSH config
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add entry related to the key installed to the SSH config file. The key file will be available for all subsequent tasks.

inputs.name: configHostname
inputs.label: Host name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Host name property of SSH config entry

inputs.name: configUser
inputs.label: User
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username property of SSH config entry

messages.SSHKeyAlreadyInstalled: The SSH key is already installed.
messages.SSHPublicKeyMalformed: Could not get the base64 portion of the public SSH key.
messages.SSHKeyInstallFailed: Failed to install the SSH key.
messages.CannotResetKnownHosts: Cannot reset the known_hosts file to its original values.
messages.GeneratingPublicKey: Generating public key out of private one.
messages.CannotResetFile: Cannot reset the %s file to its original values.
